thread.title: Fancy a 23-karat LG Watch Urbane? That’ll be $1,200 Please!
thread.title_full: Fancy a 23-karat LG Watch Urbane? That’ll be $1,200 Please!

author: Aaron Richardson
title: Fancy a 23-karat LG Watch Urbane? That’ll be $1,200 Please!
text:
Twitter 
LG surprised everyone earlier this year with their LG Watch Urbane, a brand new luxury version of the LG G Watch R which came with a premium price tag. But apparently that wasn’t enough, so they’ve decided to announce a 23-karat version of the device for those with money to burn. 
The LG Watch Urbane Luxe is a $1,200 smartwatch, and though it’s not quite as overpriced as Apple’s Watch Edition, it’s a limited-edition 23-karat gold version with a strap made of alligator leather, and will have an “exclusive” shiny lacquer case. Unfortunately it’s pretty much the same functionality as the almost $200 basic version. 
According to LG’s Chris Yie, “wearable devices shouldn’t be thought of as an extension of one’s smartphone but an extension of oneself.” 
Only 500 of the luxurious watches will be made so if you do spend $1,200 on one of these baby’s you’ll be in a pretty exclusive Android Wear club. 
Much like with the Apple Watch Edition, would you be willing to spend $1,200 on a smartwatch which has the same functionality as one worth $150? TAGS
